src:
Karim Benzema Disejajarkan dengan Ronaldo, Apa Alasannya?
07 Nov 2019, 12:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Real Madrid, Zinedine Zidane, memberi pujian tinggi kepada Karim Benzema. Bahkan, Zidane menyejajarkan Karim Benzema dengan Cristiano Ronaldo yang legendaris di Real Madrid.
Karim Benzema tampil bagus saat Real Madrid menjamu Galatasaray di pekan ke-4 Grup A Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Real Madrid menang dengan skor 6-0 pada laga di Bernabeu.
Real Madrid menang berkat tiga gol Rodrygo. Pemain asal Brasil itu mencetak hattrick di Liga Champions saat usianya baru 18 tahun 301 hari. Rodrygo menjadi bintang pada laga ini, tetapi bukan hanya Rodrygo yang bersinar.
Karim Benzema juga tampil bagus saat Real Madrid menang setengah lusin gol. Pemain asal Prancis tersebut mencetak dua gol dan satu assist di laga tersebut. Benzema mendapat banyak pujian.
text:
Karim Benzema Aligned with Ronaldo, what is the reason?
Nov 7 2019, 12:05 by Bola.net
Soccer - Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidane gave high praise to Karim Benzema. In fact, Zidane aligns Karim Benzema with the legendary Cristiano Ronaldo at Real Madrid.
Karim Benzema performed well when Real Madrid hosted Galatasaray in Week 4 of the Champions League Group A on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. Real Madrid won 6-0 in the match at the Bernabeu.
Real Madrid won thanks to Rodrygo's three goals. The Brazilian scored a hat trick in the Champions League when he was only 18 years 301 days. Rodrygo was the star of this fight, but it wasn't just Rodrygo who shined.
Karim Benzema also performed well when Real Madrid won a half dozen goals. The Frenchman scored two goals and one assist in the match. Benzema gets a lot of praise.
